last_episode_to_air.name: The Best in Class Is...
last_episode_to_air.overview: The top two go head-to-head to build the biggest chocolate showpiece yet. The final assignment? Deliver A+ work on a prehistoric theme.

name: School of Chocolate
overview: Eight professionals study the art of chocolate under the guidance of a well-known chocolatier. But only one can be the best in class and win a unique opportunity.

episodes.name: Breaking Molds and Bending Chocolate
episodes.overview: The chefs create edible illusions, including a planter box with earthy flavors, then form teams to bend chocolate into architectural shapes.

episodes.name: Dessert Deception
episodes.overview: From a coconut cake croque madame to a taco packed with chocolate popcorn, deceiving desserts fool the senses. The chefs learn to polish chocolate.

episodes.name: Make It Ooze
episodes.overview: A tense class vote follows a near disaster with a towering chocolate showpiece. Later, Amaury Guichon assigns an exercise with oozing elements.

episodes.name: Chocolate Hanging by a Thread
episodes.overview: After a controversial win in the pastry round, the students break into teams of two for a gravity-defying chocolate showpiece challenge.

episodes.name: Bittersweet Surprises
episodes.overview: A pastry challenge divides the class in two after Amaury shows his pupils how to form exquisite flower petals and a functional chocolate hinge.

episodes.name: Flying Chocolate
episodes.overview: When teams push their skills to new heights to craft kid-friendly showpieces, unfamiliar tools send chocolate flying â€” and stress skyrocketing.

episodes.name: Give Me Some Sugar
episodes.overview: Amaury creates a mind-blowing sugar dome with plastic wrap, a bucket and trapped air. Can the chefs use the technique for their own winning sweets?

episodes.name: The Best in Class Is...
episodes.overview: The top two go head-to-head to build the biggest chocolate showpiece yet. The final assignment? Deliver A+ work on a prehistoric theme.
